item.title: Zandrin
item.description: Zandrin is our 4th gen HB from Nugget x Loko. He has amazing yellows with blue bars and some vibrant red highlights on his turrets and spine. He is a phenomenal Ambilobe Panther Chameleon. Zandrin Zandrin1 Zandrin2 Zandrin3 Zandrin4 Zandrin5 Zandrin6 Zandrin7 Zandrin8 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Nugget Dam Loko 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Zandrin (F4-CG14) Generation 1 1. Zandrin (F4-CG14). Zandrin was born on 2021-06-04 at iPardalis. He is the son of Nugget (F3-CG4) and Loko (F5-CG13).
